name: Long Way Home
description:
Take a short look into the lives of two pilots stranded together on a foreign planet.

This was originally made for Global Game Jam 2019. The current version (0.8) is the one we showed at the event with no alterations or fixes made, so expect imperfection. The game "ends" after the third dialogue sequence, although the game will appear to be trying to launch you into a new battle.

Made by:

  • Liam Allen-Miller - @RSSLiam
  • Daniel Swieca - @Wetalo
  • Angela Elliott - @holosericahime
